name: Puzzle Radish
description:
In the vegetable shop, the devil is loose. Beets, peas and cauliflower fly around everywhere. Always stack three or more of the crazy outliers daringly or vertically and make them disappear from the game board. If you succeed in this often in a row, thick bonus points will beckon at you.

Make it into the high score of this ever faster puzzle game.

Attention! This game is vegan and no vegetables had to suffer for it.

There is also a free mobile version for Android devices.

Always have Fun.

Controls:

 Menu:

  • Arrow Keys Up Down: Navigate
  • Space: Select/Close

Game:

  • Arrow Keys Left-Right: Move the current Block on the screen
  • Keys Q and W: Rotate the current block around the lower stone
  • Arrow Key Down: Speed up the falling of the current block
  • Key P: Pause the game and open option menu
  • Key ESC: Return to the main screen

When you have reached a high score, you can upload it by entering your name in the field and press enter. On Android it is importend, that you press the RED button.
